title: Abhijit Banerjee on Twitter? No, Economist Says Accounts Are Fake
subtitle: Fact Check of Nobel Laureate Abhijit Banerjee on Twitter: Over the last few days, many accounts on Twitter claiming to be that of Indian origin Nobel Prize-winning economist Abhijit Banerjee have surfaced on the social media platform.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Over the last few days, many accounts on Twitter claiming to be that of Indian origin Nobel Prize-winning economist Abhijit Banerjee have surfaced on the social media platform.

Within hours of being created, these accounts (@AbhijitBanrjee and @AbhijitBanerj) gained thousands of followers and their tweets amassed huge numbers of likes and retweets.

But they have now been called out as fake after a Banerjee clarified through a statement saying he was not on Twitter.
